resume.skillmessage: Please download my CV for a more detailed summary of my skills

education.description: For my dissertation I created a 3D physics engine which involved researching the required physics laws and equations, and the various algorithms that can be applied in calculating collision detections in a 3D environment.

work.title: PC Software Engineer
work.description: My role as a Software Engineer involves development and testing of PC Software for use in a real-time control environment. The Software is used by thousands of clients to control engines, generators and associated equipment. I am regularly involved in making decisions throughout all development stages of various fast-moving project cycles, as well as assisting the more junior engineers.

work.title: Video Associate
work.description: My primary role was to assist in the creation and processing of video advertisements for small and medium businesses. I would complete a variety of tasks which involved solving customer queries via emails and telephone calls. I was faced with a range of technical and creative problems that needed solving.
